channel.title: nokia on Rabble-rousing Rambling
channel.description: Recent content in nokia on Rabble-rousing Rambling

item.title: New phone - Nokia N73
item.description: I dropped my trusty ol' Nokia 6610, from the third floor, at my office. After scourring the gazillion models and options that are available out there, I settled on two phones. Sony Ericsson K790 Cybershot Nokia N73 guess what, although the other phones seem to catch up on paper, in reality nokia still wins hands-down. Just hold the two phones in your hand, and you know that the Nokia oozes quality.
